# Fly, Swift (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 96

*You squawk twice like an eagle and suddenly long for the freedom of the skies.*

This spell functions like *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*, except as noted above.
